sql.name: loanTaskList
sql.sqlString:
select t.id, t.customer_name, t.create_by, to_char(t.create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_time, (select e.name from base_employee e where e.id = t.team_leader_old) as team_leader_old, (select e.name from base_employee e where e.id = t.team_leader_new) as team_leader_new, (select e.name from base_employee e where e.id = t.customer_leader_old) as customer_leader_old, (select e.name from base_employee e where e.id = t.customer_leader_new) as customer_leader_new, t.deliv_count, t.sts, t.reason_info from xh_loan_task_delivery t
where 1=1 $sql
